name: Companies with contracted-out manufacturing that provided designs or specifications for the goods manufactured by others, by company size: 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_provided_designs_or_specifications_for_the_goods_manufactured_by_others
variableMeasured.description: Provided Designs Or Specifications For The Goods Manufactured By Others

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2020 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2019.
